name: PBlanton's Projects on GitHub
body: ### Welcome to Phillip H. Blanton's GitHub Page. This is where I will store all of my projects. Some for Radwarrior. Some for Phasepoint Technology Partners, and some for myself. ### Authors and Contributors On GitHub I often collaborate with George Celvi (@georgepcelvi & @georgecelvi) and Chad Mello (@chadmello).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
